name: Public Research and Regulation Initiative
goal: The Public Research and Regulation Initiative (PRRI) is a world-wide initiative of public sector scientists active in biotechnology research for the common good. PRRI offers scientists a platform to be informed about and involved in international regulations and policies
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Education, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Review and implementation of the regulatory framework for GMOs
